messages.content: I have a dog called Fahad. He is not behaving well nowadays.
Sorry to hear about Fahad's behavior. Could you provide more details about the nature of his behavior? This will help me guide you better.
Everybody barks a lot nowadays. What could be the reason?

Fahad's excessive barking could be due to reasons like boredom, seeking attention, alarm, anxiety or he may be responding to other dogs. It's important to identify the cause to address it effectively.
